Plugin header.


Detailed Description

The set of plug-ins provided in the distribution.

This module list all the plug-ins provided as exemple or extensions of TREX. None of them are really required but they give an illustration on how to implement TREX extensions or give the ability to use TREX fully with both planning and execution without having to implement your own deliberative reactor (Europa plug-in) or visual interface (Vitre graphic interface).
